p: Table 5 presents the timeframes of public health events, of screening measure implementation, and of temporary recommendations for screening measures issued by WHO. As presented in Table 5 Since the IHR 2005 entered into force in 2007, temporary recommendations for exit screening measures have been issued by WHO as part of a set of measures to be implemented in areas affected from outbreaks. This happened during the EVD epidemic in West Africa in 2014/2015, in the EVD outbreak in the (Democratic Republic Congo, DRC) in 2018 and during the plague outbreak in Madagascar in 2017 [ 5]. On the contrary, entry screening measures were not part of WHO temporary recommendations for the outbreaks of EVD in West Africa, Poliovirus, EVD outbreak in DRC, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS), Yellow fever, Zika virus disease, Plague and the Influenza Pandemic (H1N1) 2009 [ 5].
